tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_feedback (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_date DATE,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    position VARCHAR(100),
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_date DATE,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeFeedback (
  feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  feedback_date DATE,
  feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview (
  review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Employee (
  employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ReviewHistory (
  history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  review_id INT,
  reviewer_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  feedback_id INT
);
CREATE TABLE Employee (employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, hire_date DATE NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT NOT NULL, reviewer_id INT NOT NULL, feedback_date DATE NOT NULL, feedback_text TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id), FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id));

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT NOT NULL, review_date DATE NOT NULL, reviewer_id INT NOT NULL, performance_rating INT NOT NULL, comments TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id), FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id));
CREATE TABLE Reviewer (reviewer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, department VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, hire_date DATE NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Department (department_id INT PRIMARY KEY, department_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, manager_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (manager_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id));
